title: A Storm in Tormay: The Complete Tormay Trilogy
description: Jute has never met a wall he couldn't climb or a house he couldn't break into. But he just robbed the wrong house. And the wrong wizard.Soon, he's on the run from assassins and thieves and the Dark itself. Aided by a talking hawk, a guilt-ridden killer and a forgetful ghost, he escapes into the northern wilds. But, as they seek to save themselves, the little company realizes more is at stake than their own lives.You can run all day and run all night, but you won't ever escape from the Dark...
author: Christopher Bunn
